name: Soul Rot
description:
Wither away all life force of your current target and up to 3 additional targets nearby, causing your primary target to suffer 14,941 Nature damage and secondary targets to suffer 7,470 Nature damage over 8 sec.

For the next 8 sec, casting Drain Life will cause you to also Drain Life from any enemy affected by your Soul Rot, and Drain Life will not consume any mana.
